sentence: Alloh  was  killed  alongside  his  father  by  an  Israeli  missile  that  struck  his  parents'  home  not  far  from  Shifa.

To  date,  more  than  11,000  people  have  been  killed  by  Israel's  military  response,  which  was  launched  after  Hamas  militants  killed  an  estimated  1,200  people  and  kidnapped  another  240  in  Israeli  towns  last  month.
